name: Project-CSE450a2-Junlin&Yuxuan
description:
The game will generate monsters in the scene randomly.  Your target is to kill them as much as possible. Every time you kill 5 monsters, you will be rewarded with 1 skill point. You can use skill points to update your character.

Here's your instructions: 

Press "Start Game" in start menu to begin.

Click mouse left button to attack.

Use W,A,S,D to move.

Use Space to dash.

Press Escape to pause the game and open the skill menu, select one buff from three.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Latest changelog:

  • 4/15/2022 New background image of higher resolution .
  • 4/15/2022 Skill - Recover 50% health. (Previously recover 50 health)
  • 4/15/2022 Adjust difficulty - Now max enemy number in map will increase by time.
  • 4/8/2022 Add UI - Start menu, game over menu, skill menu
  • 4/8/2022 Play can get skill points after killing a specific number of monsters. Monster will increase their attributes through time.
  • 4/8/2022 Add best score system
  • 4/8/2022 Add player's attack special effec - makes player's attack range longer
  • 4/8/2022 Add audio - monster death, player death, player get hit
  • 4/1/2022 Make the scene bigger and the camera will follow the player moving
  • 4/1/2022 Bug fixed: enemy AI - sometimes enemy will stuck at the boundary, trying to move out  of the boundary
  • 4/1/2022 Add enemy animation
  • 3/25/2022 Add player attack animation
  • 3/25/2022 Now can spawn infinite monsters. Add score UI
  • 3/23/2022 Fixed player attack bug
  • 3/22/2022 Enemy AI finished
  • 3/11/2022 Add audio - bgm, attack, dash
  • 3/11/2022 If player moves into monsters' alert range, monsters will chase player until player moves out from their escape range. If so, monsters will go back and roming aroud their starting position.
  • 3/4/2022 Monsters can roaming aroud its starting position now.
